Tile2D: A Tile-based Renderer

A Tile-based 2D rendering engine.

Ever just want a decent way to just make a window, load some sprites and blit them? This is for you. Ever want a 2D engine thatâ€™s super light, but also highly capable? This is also for you.

Created and maintained by Gerard Geer.
